text: it behaves how the market behaves around it what it correlates to how strong those correlations are one of the things that I think pretty much all Traders need to consider is how something works before you trade it you can figure it out pretty quick but today departs from what most of us would have expected this thing to do so that is an important note because most of us obviously need to observe a little bit more on how this product is going to behave longer term so it's a little too early we're an information gathering mode but what I would Ultra highly recommend is take a look look at how this behaves over the set time frame whatever you want to do the next week two weeks and then take a look at the SPX Definitely Maybe one of the other indices like the Russell but then pick a handful of individual stocks from within the S P 500 and then you can start creating pairs correlations between them which can be a really interesting trade idea so too early right now but something for the back pocket if you have any questions on it let me know I'll have all those links in the notes below be an outlier I'll see you guys later
